description._content: Set one or both of the dates for a photo.

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: photo_id
argument._content: The id of the photo to edit dates for.

argument.name: date_posted
argument._content: The date the photo was uploaded to flickr (see the dates documentation)

argument.name: date_taken
argument._content: The date the photo was taken (see the dates documentation)

argument.name: date_taken_granularity
argument._content: The granularity of the date the photo was taken (see the dates documentation)

error._content: The photo id was not the id of a valid photo belonging to the calling user.
No dates were specified to be changed.
The value passed for 'granularity' was not a valid flickr date granularity.
The date posted is invalid, its in the past.
The date taken is not in the format that we support.
The date taken passed is invalid. It may be in the future or way in the past.
SSL is required to access the Flickr API.
The call required signing but no signature was sent.
The login details or auth token passed were invalid.

error.message: User not logged in / Insufficient permissions
error._content: The method requires user authentication but the user was not logged in, or the authenticated method call did not have the required permissions.
The API key passed was not valid or has expired.
The requested service is temporarily unavailable.
The requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
The requested response format was not found.
The requested method was not found.
The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
